title: Economics
text:
1 Theoretical Foundations of Economics
This section contains theoretical notes related to microeconomics, game theory, industrial organization, and market equilibrium modeling. Occasionally includes references in Russian.
Проверка на вшивость

title: Reference
text:
1 Glossary, Definitions, and Tables
This section serves as a technical appendix for formulas, notation, and frequently used models. May contain some bilingual entries (EN/RU).

title: Case Studies
text:
1 Applied Case Studies
Practical applications and analyses based on real-world data. Includes demand forecasting, segmentation models, and market simulations.

title: Cogitationum Dispersa
text:
1 Welcome
This is a curated collection of notes in economics, mathematics, statistics, econometrics, and machine learning. It includes both theoretical insights and applied case studies. While the primary language is English, some notes may include sections in Russian when contextually appropriate.
